Blog 4

Published on Feb 28, 2020

    Basic of Wireshark

    Wireshark is an open-source packet analyzer it captures packets in real-time and shows a humanly readable format, includes filters, color code, and many more. Available for Windows and macOs from official site. The purpose of this tool for educational objectives, companies will not allow the use of this tool without permission. To start using, you need to click on capture > start. Wireshark will now start capturing packets sent and from your system. Afterward, you can stop by clicking on the red square. Now you probably see packets with highlighted colors, it helps to capture traffic by looking at it. Under help > search for coloring rules, we can understand what default colors are used for. You can inspect your package by using filters you can go to Analyze > filters or type in the search box, for example, we can type TCP and view TCP packets. Wireshark is a very powerful tool there are many ways to use it we could inspect the package by applying custom filters. The more time spend on Wireshark more we learn what’s going on in the network.
